#summary Notes on making release so I don't forget anything

 * Send an e-mail to arora-dev to get translations a week before release.
 * Run lupdate arora.pro

= tag =

 * Check for any patches on github and the mailinglist
 * Regenerate AUTHORS, check for duplicates
 * Run findstyleerrors.sh
 * Run lupdate arora.pro
 * Update changelog
 * bump version in debian-upstream/changelog.in and src/browserapplication.cpp

 * Make a git tag
{{{
 git tag -a 0.5 -m "Version 0.5"
}}}

= tarball =

 * Make a tag like below and upload to arora-browser.org
 * git archive --format=tar --prefix=arora-0.5/ 0.5 | gzip >arora-0.5.tar.gz

= binary packages == 
 * see BuildingOnWindows
